remarks: Restriction of the codomain of a homomorphism.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jun-2015.)
statement:
resghm2.u $e |- U = ( T |`s X ) $.
resghm2b $p |- ( ( X e. ( SubGrp ` T ) /\ ran F C_ X ) -> ( F e. ( S GrpHom T ) <-> F e. ( S GrpHom U ) ) ) $.
